Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Las Vegas (South of The Strip), Cancun Resort by Diamond Resorts is close to Town Square Las Vegas and Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign. This condominium resort is within the vicinity of Bali Hai Golf Club and St. Rose Dominican Hospital.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 440 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided once per stay.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a waterslide, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Cancun Resort by Diamond Resorts. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and ATM/banking services. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Cancun Resort by Diamond Resorts. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Las Vegas (South of The Strip), Cancun Resort by Diamond Resorts is close to Town Square Las Vegas and Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign. This condominium resort is within the vicinity of Bali Hai Golf Club and St. Rose Dominican Hospital.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Town Square Las Vegas - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
St. Rose Dominican Hospital - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Sunset Park - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Orleans Arena - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Crystals at City Center - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
The District at Green Valley Ranch - 8.1 km / 5.1 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Wildhorse Golf Club - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Rio Secco Golf Club - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Desert Research Institute - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi

The preferred airport for Cancun Resort by Diamond Resorts is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Cancun Resort Villas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.
